title: Ariel Bro
about: Ariel is a professional coach. Specialist in adaptive physical culture, physical therapy and rehabilitation. Personal trainer and instructor of group programs with more than 10 years of experience. Specialization: figure and posture correction, weight loss, rehabilitation after injuries, pilates. Ariel places special emphasis on the development of a strong back, flexibility and restoration of muscle tone. Inspires, motivates, tunes into the right wave. It helps to easily lose excess weight and start living a new life in harmony with oneself. Life attitude: You can't stop, you have to spin the earth. After all, you can do everything!
descriptionItem: This Item page for Ariel Bro
